title: Avatar of Victory

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - This role is random role that won a previous GIM game. If the role's been changed since then, it's the **original** version (the one that won that game). If a role's won multiple times (i.e. Eyisa, Locust), only the first one is considered.

desc:
Post 797
*The nameless conquerer of a thousand battles.*
